t: Capitol Christian Music Group - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - Capitol Christian Music Group (Capitol CMG) (formerly known as EMI Christian Music Group) is an American music group that, since 2013, is under the ownership of Universal Music Group. Based in Nashville, Tennessee, the label is in the Christian Gospel music industry.

t: Capitol Music Group - UMG
s: November 26, 2024 - Capitol Music Group (CMG) is comprised of Capitol Records, Blue Note Records, Motown Records, Astralwerks, Priority Records and Capitol Christian Music Group. Capitol Music Group is a subsidiary of Universal Music Group and is headquartered in the world-famous Capitol Tower in Hollywood, California.
